articles.description: Musk thanked Trump for allowing him to lead Doge and says he believed the cost-cutting agency would continue to grow.
articles.title: Elon Musk says he is leaving Trump administration

articles.description: Thames Water faces a major fine and France's president cosies up with his wife on Thursday's front pages.
articles.title: '£123m down the drain' and 'Better than a slap'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The party is at a 'hugely important crossroads'. But is Badenoch helping or, as some suggest, adding to the challenge - and what does it mean for her future as Tory leader?
articles.title: Kemi Badenoch's missteps are a 'total disaster' say Tory insiders

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The Court of International Trade ruled that an emergency law invoked by the White House does not provide unilateral authority to impose tariffs on nearly every country.
articles.title: US trade court rules Trump overstepped his authority with global tariffs

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Changes to planning laws could speed up projects, but experts warn water consumption will also need limiting.
articles.title: Government fast-tracks new reservoirs to secure water supply

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The rule requiring planning permission if a heat pump is within 1m of a neighbours property has been removed.
articles.title: Planning change makes heat pump installations easier for homes

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The government says its overhaul of retirement savings will boost growth and pension pots.
articles.title: Reeves outlines plan for £25bn pension 'megafunds'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Many homes in Blatten have been flattened after a large chunk of the Birch glacier fell on to the village.
articles.title: Swiss glacier collapse buries most of village of Blatten

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Joshlin Smith's mother, branded the "mastermind" in her child's disappearance, is to be sentenced.
articles.title: Joshlin Smith sentencing: Tears and heartbreak over tragic story of South African girl sold by her mother

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The strategic defence review, announced by the government last July, will be published on Monday.
